GK16ruyalssu:1: alaṅkārasarvasvam namaskṛtya parāṃ vācaṃ devīṃ trividhavigrahām /
GK16ruyalssu:3: START Bhūmikā iha hi tāvad bhāmahodbhaṭaprabhṛtayaścirantanālaṅkārakārāḥ pratīyamānamarthe vācyopaskārakatayālaṅkārapakṣanikṣitpaṃ manyante /
GK16ruyalssu:6: svasamarpaṇam' iti yathāyogaṃ dvividhayā bhaṅgyā pratipāditaṃ taiḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:12: vāmanena tu sādṛśyanibandhanāyā lakṣaṇāya vakroktyalaṅkāratvaṃ bruvatā kaściddhvanibhedo 'laṅkāratayaivoktaḥ
GK16ruyalssu:17: tadevamalaṅkārā eva kāvye pradhānamiti prācyānāṃ matam /
GK16ruyalssu:21: satyapi tribhede pratīyamāne vyāpārarūpā bhaṇitireva kavisaṃrambhagocaraḥ
GK16ruyalssu:25: bhaṭṭanāyakena tu vyaṅgyavyāpārasya prauḍhoktyābhyupagatasya kāvyaṃśatvaṃ bruvatā nyagbhāvitaśabdārthasvarūpasya vyāpārasyaiva prādhānyamuktam /
GK16ruyalssu:27: dhvanikāraḥ punarabhidhātātparyalakṣaṇākhyavyāpāratrayottīrṇasya dhvananadyotanādiśabdābhidheyasya vyañjanavyāpārasyāvaśyābhyupagamyatvād vyāpārasya ca vākyārthatvābhāvād vākyārthasyaiva ca vyāṅgyarūpasya
GK16ruyalssu:29: vyāpārasya viṣayamukhena svaruṇpratilambhāt tatprādhānyena prādhānyāt svarūpeṇa vicāryatvābhāvād viṣayasyaiva samagrabharasahiṣṇutvam /
GK16ruyalssu:30: tasmād viṣaya eva vyaṅgyanāmā jīvitatvena vaktavyaḥ,yasya
GK16ruyalssu:34: tasmād vyaṅgya eva vākyārthībhūtaḥ kāvyajīvitamityeṣa eva pakṣo vākyārthavidāṃ sahṛdayānāmāvarjakaḥ
GK16ruyalssu:36: yattu vyaktivivekakāro vācyasya pratīyamānaṃ prati liṅgatayā vyañjanasyānumānāntarbhāvamākhyat tad vācyasya pratīyamānena saha tādāpmyatadutpattyabhāvādavicāritābhidhānam /
GK16ruyalssu:39: tatra vyaṅgyasya prādhānyāprādhānyābhyāṃ dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyau dvau kāvyabhedau /
GK16ruyalssu:55: ihārthapaunaruktyaṃ śabdapaunaruktyaṃ śabdārthapaunaruktyaṃ ceti trayaḥ paunaruktyaprakārāḥ ādau paunaruktyaprakāraravacanaṃ vakṣyamāṇālaṅkārāṇāṃ kakṣāvibhāgaghaṭanārtham /
GK16ruyalssu:83: alaṃkāraprastāve kevalaṃ svarapaunaruktyamacārutvānna gaṇyate iti dvaividhyameva /
GK16ruyalssu:88: 'kiṃ nāma dardura duradhyavasāya sāyaṃ kāyaṃ nipīḍya ninadaṃ kuruṣe ruṣeva
GK16ruyalssu:89: etāni kelirasitāni sitacchadānāmākarṇya kārṇamadhurāṇi na lajjito 'si' //
GK16ruyalssu:90: atra sāyaṃśabdenāsyālaṅkārasya yakāramātrasādṛśyāpekṣayā vṛttyanuprāsena sahaikābhidhānalakṣaṇaḥ saṃkaraḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:100: 'āṭopena paṭīyayasā yadapi sā vāṇī kaverāmukhe khelantī prathame tathāpi kurute no sanmanorañjanam
GK16ruyalssu:105: na tvetāḥ saralāḥ sitāsitarucaḥ sācīkṛtāḥ sālasāḥ sākūtāḥ samadāḥ kuraṅgakadṛśāṃ mānānuvidhdā dṛśaḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:108: atra kvacidbhinnārthatvaṃ kvicidabhinnārthatvaṃ kacidekasyānarthakatvamaparasya sārthakatvamiti saṃkṣepataḥ prakāratrayam
GK16ruyalssu:124: 'tālā jaanti guṇā jālā de sahiaehiṃ gheppanti /
GK16ruyalssu:128: 'brūmaḥ kiyannaya kathañcana kālamalpam atrābjapatranayane nayane nimīlya
GK16ruyalssu:144: yadyapi lipyakṣarāṇāṃ khaṅgādisaṃniveśaviśiṣṭatvaṃ tathāpi śrotrākāśasamavetavarṇātmakaśabdābhedena teṣāṃ loke pratītervācakaśabdālaṅkāro 'yam /
GK16ruyalssu:161: yadāhuḥ-'yatra kiñcitsāmānyaṃ kaściñca viśeṣaḥ sa viṣayaḥ sadṛśatāyāḥ' iti
GK16ruyalssu:170: saṃskāravatyeva girā manīṣī tayā sa pūtaśca vibhūṣitaśca' //
GK16ruyalssu:172: digdho 'mṛtena ca viṣeṇa ca pakṣmalākṣyā gāḍhaṃ nikhāta iva me hṛdaye
GK16ruyalssu:185: 'yuddhe 'rjuno 'rjuna iva prathitapratāpo bhīmo 'pi bhīma iva vairiṣu
GK16ruyalssu:193: iyaṃ ca dharmasya sādhāraṇye vastuprativastunirdeśe ca dvidhā /
GK16ruyalssu:195: 'khamiva jalaṃ jalamiva khaṃ haṃsaścandra iva haṃsa iva candraḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:219: teṣāṃ duḥsahakāmadehadahanaprodbhatanetrānala- jvālālībharabhāsvare smaripāvastaṃ gataṃ kautukam'
GK16ruyalssu:229: anyathā tu viṣayiṇā viṣayasya rūpavataḥ karaṇādrūpakam /
GK16ruyalssu:234: idaṃ tu niravayavaṃ sāvayavaṃ paramparitamiti trividham /
GK16ruyalssu:239: anye tū pratyekaṃ vākyoktasamāsoktādibhedāḥ saṃbhavanti te 'nyato
GK16ruyalssu:242: 'dāse kṛtāgāsi bhavatyucitaḥ prabhūṇāṃ pādaprahāra iti sundari nāsmi dūye /
GK16ruyalssu:243: udyatkaṭhorapulakāṅkurakaṇṭakāgrair- yatkhidyate tava padaṃ nanu sā vyathā
GK16ruyalssu:247: dvirbhāvaḥ smarakārmukasya kimapi prāṇeśvarīsāgasā- māśātanturudañcati pratipadi prāleyabhānostanuḥ'
GK16ruyalssu:252: indutviṣo yudhi haṭhena tavārikīrtī- rānīya yatra ramate taruṇaḥ pratāpaḥ'
GK16ruyalssu:255: 'kiṃ padmamya ruciṃ na hanti nayanānandaṃ vidhatte na vā vṛddhiṃ vā jhaṣaketanasya kurute nālokamātreṇa kim /
GK16ruyalssu:256: vaktrendau tava satyayaṃ yadaparaḥ śītāṃśurabhyudgato darpaḥ syādamṛtena cidiha tadapyastyeva bimbādhare' //
GK16ruyalssu:259: satyaprītividhānadakṣa vijayaprāgbhāvabhīma prabho sāmrājyaṃ varavīra vatsaraśataṃ vairiñcamuccaiḥ kriyāḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:260: atra tvameva haṃsa ityāropaṇapūrvako mānasameva mānasamityādyāropa iti śliṣṭaśabdaṃ mālāparamparitam
GK16ruyalssu:271: yaireṣāpi durāśayā kaliyuge rājāvalī sevitā teṣāṃ śūlini bhaktimātrasulabhe sevā kiyatkauśalam'
GK16ruyalssu:277: maraṇaṃ ca jaladabhujagajaṃ prasahya kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām' //
GK16ruyalssu:278: ityatra niyatasaṃkhyākakāryaviśeṣotthāpito garalārthaprabhāvito viṣaśabde śleṣa eva /
GK16ruyalssu:279: jaladabhujagajamiti rūpakasādhakamiti pūrve siddhatvābhāvānna tannicanvanaṃ viṣaśabde śliṣṭaśabdaṃ paramparitamiti śleṣa evātretyāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:282: āropyamāṇaṃ rūpake prakṛtopayogitvābhāvātprakṛtoparañjakatvenaiva kevalenānvayaṃ bhajate pariṇāme tu prakṛtātmatayā āropyamāṇasyopayoga iti prakṛtamāropyamāṇarūpatvena pariṇamiti /
GK16ruyalssu:287: vyāmagrāhyastanībhiḥ śabarayuvatibhiḥ kautukodañcadakṣaṃ kṛcchrādanvīyamānastvaritamaya giriṃ citrakūṭaṃ pratasthe' //
GK16ruyalssu:290: tadatra yathā samāsoktāvāronyamāṇaṃ prakṛtopayogi taccāropaviṣayātmatayā tatra sthitam, ata eva tatra tadvyavahārasamāropaḥ evamihāpi jñeyam,
GK16ruyalssu:291: kevalaṃ tatra viṣayasyaiva prayogaḥ, viṣayiṇo gamyamānatvāt /
GK16ruyalssu:292: iha tu dvayorapyabhidhānam, tādātmyāt tu tayoḥ pariṇāmitvam /
GK16ruyalssu:308: 'kiṃ tāruṇyataroriyaṃ rasabharodbhinnā navā vallarī līlāprocchalitasya kiṃ
GK16ruyalssu:310: udgāḍhotkalikāvatāṃ svasamayopanyāsavistrambhiṇaḥ kiṃ sākṣādupadeśayaṣṭirathavā devasya śṛṅgāriṇaḥ'
GK16ruyalssu:313: 'ayaṃ mārtaṇḍaḥ kiṃ sa khalu turagaiḥ satpabhiritaḥ kṛśānuḥ kiṃ sākṣātprasarati diśo naiṣa niyatam /
GK16ruyalssu:314: kṛtāntaḥ kiṃ sākṣānmahiṣavahano 'sāviti cirāt samalokyājau tvāṃ vidadhati
GK16ruyalssu:316: niścayānto yatra saṃśaya upakramo niścaye paryavasānam /
GK16ruyalssu:318: 'induḥ kiṃ kva kalaṅkaḥ sarasijametatkimambu kutra gatam /
GK16ruyalssu:322: 'rañjitā nu vividhāstaruśailā nāmitaṃ tu gaganaṃ mthagitaṃ nu /
GK16ruyalssu:323: pūritā nu viṣameṣu dharitrī saṃhṛtā nu kakubhastimireṇa' //
GK16ruyalssu:334: 'oṣṭhe bimbaphalāśayālamalakeṣūtpākajambūdhiyā karṇolaṅkṛtibhāji dāḍimaphalabhrāntyā ca śoṇe bhaṇau /
GK16ruyalssu:335: niṣpattyā sakṛdutpalacchadadṛśāmāttaklamānāṃ marau rājangṛrjararājapañjaraśukaiḥ sadyastṛṣā mūrcchitam' //
GK16ruyalssu:342: evaṃ sthāṇurvā syātpuruṣo vā syāditi saṃśaye 'pi boddhavyam /
GK16ruyalssu:362: yatra tu rūpakaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tatra cediyamapi bhaṅgiḥ saṃbhāvinī tatsaṃkaro 'stu /
GK16ruyalssu:365: evaṃ hi tatra viṣaye bhrāntimadalaṅkāro 'stu atadrūpasya tadrūpatāpratītinibandhanatvāt /
GK16ruyalssu:371: grahītṛbhedākhyena viṣayavibhāgenānekadhātvoṭṭaṅkanāttasya ca vicchittyantararūpatvāt sarvathā nāsyāntarbhāvaḥ śakyakriya iti niścayaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:372: yathā vā- 'ṇārāaṇot ti pariṇaavaāhiṃ sirivallahot ti taruṇīhiṃ /
GK16ruyalssu:373: bālāhiṃ uṇa kodūhaleṇa eme a saccavio' //
GK16ruyalssu:378: iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ-pūrvatra grahītṛbhedenānekadhātvollekhaḥ, iha tu viṣayabhedena /
GK16ruyalssu:379: nanvanekadhātvollekhane gurvādirūpatayā śleṣa iti kathamalaṅkārāntaramatra sthāpyate /
GK16ruyalssu:381: anekadhātvanimittaṃ tu vicchittyantaramatra dṛśyate iti tatpratibhotpattihetuḥ śleṣo 'tra syāt /
GK16ruyalssu:391: tasya ca trayī bandhacchāyā, apahnavapūrvaka āropaḥ, āropapūrvako
GK16ruyalssu:397: 'yadetaccandrāntarjaladalavalīlāṃ prakurute tadācaṣṭe lokaḥ śaśaka iti no
GK16ruyalssu:401: atraindavasya śaśasyāpahnave upakṣitpe śaśakaprativastukiṇavata indorāropo nānvayaghaṭanāṃ puṣyatīti na niravadyam /
GK16ruyalssu:408: na tu rucirakalāpe vartate yo mayūre vitaratu sa kumāro brahmacaryaśriyaṃ
GK16ruyalssu:413: sārdhaṃ tvadripubhistvadīyaśasāṃ śūnye marau dhāvatāṃ bhraṣṭaṃ
GK16ruyalssu:415: atra śūnya ityasya sthāne manyeśabdaprayoge sāpahnavotprekṣā ittayapi
GK16ruyalssu:416: sthāpayiṣyate, ' ahaṃ tvinduṃ manye ' iti tu vākyabhede
GK16ruyalssu:418: etasminnapi bhedo 'pahnavāropayoḥ paurvāparyaprayogaviparyaye bhedadvayaṃ sadapi na pūrvavaccitratāvahamiti na bhedatvena gaṇitam /
GK16ruyalssu:422: dvīpāddvīpaṃ bhramati dadhatī candramudākāpāne nyastaṃ siddhāñjanaparimalaṃ lāñcanasya cchalena'
GK16ruyalssu:425: 'amuṣmiṃllāvaṇyāmṛtasarasi nūnaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ smaraḥ śarvapluṣṭaḥ pṛthujaghanabhāge nipatitaḥ
GK16ruyalssu:426: yadaṅgāṅgārāṇāṃ praśamapiśunā nābhikuhare khikhā dhūmasyeyaṃ pariṇamati
GK16ruyalssu:430: evamabhedaprādhānye āropagarbhānalaṅkārāṃllakṣayitvā adhyavasāyagarbhāṃllukṣayati- tatra adhyavasāye vyāpāraprādhānye utprekṣā // RuAss_22 //
GK16ruyalssu:434: asatyatvaṃ ca viṣayigatasya dharmasya viṣaya upanibandhe viṣayisaṃbhāvitvena viṣayāsaṃbhāvitvena ca pratīteḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:436: tatrāparamārthatayā asatyatvaṃ pratīyate, itarasya tu paramārthatayā
GK16ruyalssu:449: prakṛtasyaitadbhedayoge 'pi na vaicitryamiti na te gaṇitāḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:451: bhedāṣṭakasya ca pratyekaṃ nimittasya guṇākriyārūpatve ṣoḍaśa bhedāḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:452: teṣāṃ ca pratyekaṃ nimittasyopādānānupādanābhyāṃ dvātriṃśatprabhedāḥ, teṣu ca pratyekaṃ hetusvarūpaphalotprekṣaṇarūpatvena ṣaṇṇavatirbhedāḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:454: tatrāpi dravyasya prāyaḥ svarūpotprekṣaṇameveti hetuphalotprekṣābhedāstataḥ pātanīyāḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:455: pratīyamānāyāstu yadyapyuddeśata etāvantobhedāḥ, tathāpi nimittasyānupādānaṃ tasyāṃ na saṃbhavatīti tairbhedair yūno 'yaṃ prakāraḥ
GK16ruyalssu:458: eṣā cārthāśrayati dharmaviṣaye śliṣṭaśabdahetukā kvacitpadārthānvayavelāyāṃ sādṛśyābhivānādupakrāntāpyupamāvākyārthatātparyasāmarythābhimantṛvyāpāropārohakrameṇotprekṣāyāṃ paryavasyati /
GK16ruyalssu:463: 'sa vaḥ pāyādindurnavabisalatākoṭikuṭilaḥ- smārāreryo mūrdhni jvalanakapiśo bhāti nihitaḥ
GK16ruyalssu:464: stravanmandākinyāḥ pratidivasasiktena payasā kapālenonmuktaḥ sphaṭikadhavalenāṅkura iva' //
GK16ruyalssu:472: 'saiṣā sthalī yatra vicinvatā tvāṃ bhraṣṭaṃ mayā nūpuramekamurvyām /
GK16ruyalssu:487: kriyāyā yathā- r'idṛkṣāṃ kṣāmatāṃ gatau' ityatra kṣāmatāgamanasya /
GK16ruyalssu:493: dig dakṣiṇā gandhavahaṃ mukhena vyalīkaniḥ śvāsamivotsasarja' //
GK16ruyalssu:509: upamopakramotprekṣā yathā - 'kastūrītilakanti bhālaphalake devyā mukhāmbhoruhe rolambanti tamālabālamukulottaṃsanti maulāvapi /
GK16ruyalssu:510: yāḥ karṇe vikacotpalanti kucayoraṅke ca kālāguru- sthāsanti prathayantu tāstava śivaṃ śrīkaṇṭhakaṇṭhatviśaṣaḥ'
GK16ruyalssu:511: atra yadyapi 'sarvaprātipadikebhyaḥ kkip' ityupamānātkkibvidhāvāmukhe upamāpratītistathāpyupamānasya prakṛte saṃbhavaucityātsaṃbhāvanotthane utprekṣāyāṃ paryavasānam /
GK16ruyalssu:513: eṣāpi samastopamāpratīpādakaviṣaye 'pi harṣacaritavārtite sāhityamīmāṃsāyāṃ ca teṣu teṣu pradeśeṣudāhṛtā, iha tu granthavistarabhayānna prapañcitā /
GK16ruyalssu:520: tatprayoge tu prakṛtasya rājñaḥ pākaśāsanatvapratītāvadhyavasāyasaṃbhāvādivaśabdena ca tasya sādhyatvapratīterutprekṣaiveyam /
GK16ruyalssu:523: tadevaṃ prakāravaicitryeṇāvasthitāyā utprekṣāyā hetūtprekṣāyāṃ yasya prakṛtasaṃbandhino dharmasya heturutprekṣate sa dharmo 'dhyavasāyavaśādabhinna utprekṣāyāṃ nimittatvenāśrīyate /
GK16ruyalssu:524: sa ca vācya eva niyamena bhavati /
GK16ruyalssu:527: atra kapolayoḥ prakṛtayoḥ saṃbandhitvenopāttasya kṣāmatāgamanasya heturadarśanamutprekṣitam
GK16ruyalssu:533: svarūpotprekṣāyāṃ yatra dharmī dharmyantaragatatvenotpekṣyate tatrāpi nimittabhūto dharmaḥ kkacinnirdiśyate /
GK16ruyalssu:537: yatra ca dharma eva dharmigatatvenotprekṣyate tatrāpi nimittasyopādānānupādānābhyam /
GK16ruyalssu:543: atra tamotatatvena lepanakriyākartṛtvopekṣāyāṃ vyāpanādi nimittaṃ gamyamānam /
GK16ruyalssu:548: phalotprekṣāyāṃ yadeva tasya kāraṇaṃ tadeva nimittam /
GK16ruyalssu:555: tadasāvutprekṣāyāḥ kakṣyāvibhāgaḥ pracuratayā sthito 'pi lakṣye duravadhāratvādiha na prapañcitaḥ
GK16ruyalssu:558: yathodāhṛtaṃ prāk 'ahaṃ tvinduṃ manye tvadariviraha' ityādi /
GK16ruyalssu:563: adhyavasāne trayaṃ saṃbhavati- svarūpaṃ viṣayo viṣayī ca /
GK16ruyalssu:585: yathā vā-- 'maggialaddhaṃmi valāmoḍiacuṃbieṃ apyaṇā a uvaṇamie /
GK16ruyalssu:591: 'lāvaṇyadraviṇavyayo na gaṇitaḥ kleśo mahānsvīkṛtaḥ svacchandaṃ carato
GK16ruyalssu:593: eṣāpi svaguṇānurūparamaṇābhāvād varākī hatā ko 'rthaścetasi vedhasā vinihitastanvyāstanuṃ tanvatā' //
GK16ruyalssu:596: yathā vā-- 'asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatipabhūccandro nu kāntipradaḥ śṛṅgāraikarasaḥ svayaṃ nu madano māso nu puṣkākaraḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:597: vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ nu viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhavenmanoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:603: pracayavān bāṣpaḥ praṇālocitaḥ śvāsāḥ preṅkhikatadīpradīpakalikāḥ pāṇṭimni magnaṃ vapuḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:604: kiṃ tāmyatkathagrāmi rātrimakhilāṃ tvanmārgavātāgrane hastacchattraniruddhacandramahasastasyāḥ sthitirvartate' //
GK16ruyalssu:616: vāstavaṃ saundaryaṃ kavisamarpitena saundaryeṇābhedenādhyavasitaṃ bhede 'bhedavacanasya nimittam /
GK16ruyalssu:618: na tu vadanādīnāṃ kamalādibhirabhedādhyavasāyo yojanīyaḥ, abhede bheda ityādiṣu prakāreṣvaṣyāpteḥ
GK16ruyalssu:619: tatra hi 'aṇṇaṃ laḍahṛttaṇaaṃ' ityādau sātiśayaṃ laḍahatvaṃ
GK16ruyalssu:623: prakārapañcakamadhyātkāryakāraṇabhāvena yaḥ prakāraḥ sa kāryakāraṇatāśrayālaṅkāraprastāve prapañcārthaṃ lakṣiyiṣyate /
GK16ruyalssu:626: tatrāpi padārthavākyārtagatatvena teṣāṃ dvaividhye padārthagatamalaṅkāradvayaṃ krameṇocyate-
GK16ruyalssu:627: aupamyasya gamyatve padārthagatatvena prastutānāmaprastutānāṃ vā samānadharmābhisaṃbandhe tulyayogitā // RuAss_24 //
GK16ruyalssu:629: tatra prākaraṇikānāmapraraṇikānāṃ vārthānāṃ samānaguṇakriyāsaṃbandhe anvitārthā tulyayogitā
GK16ruyalssu:633: atra ṛtuvarṇanasya prakāntatvāddinānāṃ padmānāṃ ca prakṛtatvād vṛddhigamanaṃ kriyā /
GK16ruyalssu:641: bhagnasya gūrjaranṛpasya rajaḥ kayāpi tanvyā tavāsilatayā ca yaśaḥ prabhṛṣṭam' //
GK16ruyalssu:642: atra gūrjaraṃ prati nāyikāsilatayoraprākaraṇikatve mārjanaṃ kriyā /
GK16ruyalssu:658: vastutastu vākyārthatve ādimadhyāntavākyagatatvena dharmasya vṛttāvādibhamadhyāntadīpakākhyāstrayo 'sya bhedāḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:659: krameṇodāharaṇam - 'rehai mihireṇa ṇahaṃ raseṇa kavvaṃ sareṇa jovvaṇaaṃ /
GK16ruyalssu:661: ('reyate mihireṇa nabho rasena kāvyaṃ sareṇa [smareṇa] yauvanam amṛtena dhunīdhavaḥsvayā naramātha! bhuvanamidam' //)//
GK16ruyalssu:663: pracakrame pallavarāgatāmrā prabhā pataṅgasya munaśca dhenuḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:669: atra ca yathānekakārakagatatvennaikakriyā dīpakaṃ tathānekakriyāgatatvenaikakārakamapi dīpakam
GK16ruyalssu:672: na kutūhali kasya manaścaritaṃ ca mahātmanāṃ śrotum' //
GK16ruyalssu:690: atra caturatvaṃ sādhāraṇe dharmaṃ upamānavākye, upameyavākye tu nipuṇapadena nirdiṣṭaḥ
GK16ruyalssu:692: yathātraivottarasthāne 'vināvantīrna nipuṇāḥ sudṛśo ratanarmaṇi' iti pāṭhe /
GK16ruyalssu:701: devīṃ vācamupāsate hi bahyavaḥ sāraṃ tu sārastvataṃ jānīte nitarāmasau gurukulakliṣṭo murāriḥ kaviḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:702: atra yadyapi ñcānākhya eko dharmo nirdiṣṭastathāpi na tannibandhanamaupabhyaṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16ruyalssu:703: yannibandhanaṃ ca vivakṣitaṃ tatrābdhilaṅghanādāvastyeva divyavāgupāsanādinā pratibimbanam
GK16ruyalssu:705: 'kṛtaṃ ca garvābhimukhaṃ manastvayā kimanyadevaṃ nihatāśca no 'rayaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:709: saṃbhāvatāsaṃbhavatā vā vastusaṃbandhena gamyamānaṃ pratibimbakaraṇaṃ nidarśanā // RuAss_28
GK16ruyalssu:727: yatra ca prakṛte vākyārthe vākyārthāntaramāropyate sāmānādhikaraṇyena tatra saṃbandhānupapattimūlā nidarśanaiva yuktā, na dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:733: iyaṃ copemeya upamānavṛttasyāsaṃbhavātpratipāditā pūrvaiḥ vastutastūpameyavṛttasyopamāne 'saṃbhavādapi bhavati /
GK16ruyalssu:751: 'utkope tvayi kiñcideva calati drāggūrjarakṣmābhṛtā muktā bhūrna paraṃ bhayānmarujuṣāṃ yāvattadeṇīdṛśām
GK16ruyalssu:752: padbhyāṃ haṃsagatirmukhena śaśinaḥ kāntiḥ kucābhyāmapi kṣāmābhyāṃ sahasaiva vanyakariṇāṃ gaṇḍasthalīvibhramaḥ'
GK16ruyalssu:754: sā ca tayoranupapannā sādṛśyaṃ gamayatīti asaṃbhavadvastusaṃbanvanibandhanā nidarśanā /
GK16ruyalssu:759: sa ca dvidhā bhavati, upamānādupameyasyādhikaguṇatve viparyaye vā bhāvāt /
GK16ruyalssu:763: 'kṣīṇaḥ kṣoṇo 'pi śaśī bhūyo bhūyo vivardhate satyam /
GK16ruyalssu:764: virama prasīda sundari yauvanamanivarti yātaṃ tu' //
GK16ruyalssu:793: atra vighaṭanaṃ saṃbandhibhedādbhinnaṃ na tu śliṣṭam /
GK16ruyalssu:798: karmasāhitye yathā - 'dyujano mutyunā sārdhaṃ yasyājau tārakāmaye /
GK16ruyalssu:803: 'utkṣitpaṃ saha kauśikasya pulakaiḥ sārdhaṃ mukhairnāmitaṃ bhūpānāṃ
GK16ruyalssu:805: vaidehyā manasā samaṃ ca sahasākṛṣṭaṃ tato bhārgava-
GK16ruyalssu:806: prauḍhāhaṅkṛtikandalena ca samaṃ tad bhagnamaiśaṃ dhanuḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:812: tedve sattvāsattve yatra kasyacidasaṃnidhānānnibadhyete sā dvidhā vinoktiḥ
GK16ruyalssu:816: 'vinayena vinā kā śrīḥ kā niśā śaśinā vinā /
GK16ruyalssu:818: atra vināśabdamantareṇāpi vinārthavivakṣā yathākathañcinnimittībhavati yathā sahoktau sahārthavivakṣā
GK16ruyalssu:820: 'nirarthakaṃ janma gataṃ nalinyā yathā na dṛṣṭaṃ tuhināṃśubimbam /
GK16ruyalssu:821: utpattirindorapi niṣphalaiva na yena dṛṣṭā nalinī prabuddhā' //
GK16ruyalssu:835: iha prastutāprastutānāṃ kvacid vācyatvaṃ kvacid gamyatvamiti dvaividhyam /
GK16ruyalssu:836: vācyatvaṃ ca śleṣanirdeśabhaṅgyā pṛthagupādānena vetyapi dvaividhyam /
GK16ruyalssu:838: gumyatvaṃ tu prastutaniṣṭhamaprastutapraśaṃsāviṣayaḥ aprastutaniṇṭhaṃ tu samāsoktiviṣayaḥ
GK16ruyalssu:844: tacca viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ śliṣṭatayā sādhāraṇyenaupamyagarbhatvena ca bhavat tridhā bhavati tatra śliṣṭatayā yathā - 'upoḍharāgeṇa vilolatārakaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā niśāmukham ṣa yathā samastaṃ timirāṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi
GK16ruyalssu:848: sādhāraṇyena yathā - 'tanvī manoramā bālā lolākṣī puṣpahāsinī /
GK16ruyalssu:859: atra dantaprabhā puṣpāṇīveti suveṣatvavaśādupamāgarbhatvena kṛte samāse paścāddantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpaiściteti samāsāntarāśrayaṇena samānaviśeṣaṇamāhātmyāllatāvyavahārapratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:861: saṃkarasamāśrayeṇa kṛte yojane paścāt pūrvavat samāsāntaramahimnā latāpratītijñaṃyā /
GK16ruyalssu:862: rūpakagarbhatvena tu samāsāntarāśrayaṇāt samānaviṣeṣaṇatvaṃ bhavadapi na samāsokteḥ prayojakam
GK16ruyalssu:869: dhārānipātaiḥ saha kiṃ nu vāntaścandro 'yamitpārtataraṃ rarāsa' //
GK16ruyalssu:870: atra nirīkṣaṇānuguṇyādvidyunnayanairiti rūpake payodasya draṣṭṛpuruṣanirūpaṇamārtataraṃ rarāsetyatra pratīyamānotprekṣāyā nimittatvaṃ bhajate /
GK16ruyalssu:874: kuṭilalipibhiḥ kaṃ kāyasthaṃ na nāma visūtrayan vyadhita virahiprāṇeṣvāyavyayāvadhikaṃ madhuḥ' [śrī. ca. 670] //
GK16ruyalssu:875: atra hi pattralipikāyasthaśabdeṣu śleṣagarbhe rūpakaṃ dvirephamaṣīlavairityetadrūpakanimittam
GK16ruyalssu:876: asya ca pracuraḥ prayogaviṣaya iti na samāsoktibuddhiḥ kāryā /
GK16ruyalssu:882: iyaṃ ca śuddhakāryasamāropeṇa viśeṣaṇasāmyenobhayamayatvena prathamaṃ tridhā samāsoktiḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:888: śāstrīye vā laukikavastuvyavahāramāropa iti caturdhā bhavati /
GK16ruyalssu:891: 'vilikhati kucāvuccairgāḍhaṃ karoti kacagrahaṃ likhati lalite vaktre
GK16ruyalssu:893: kṣitipa khadiraḥ śroṇībimbād vikarṣati cāṃśukaṃ marubhuvi haṭhāt trasyantīnāṃ tavārimṛgīdṛśām'
GK16ruyalssu:898: yāntīnāmatisaṃbhramākulapadanyāsaṃ marau nīrasaiḥ kiṃ kiṃ kaṇṭakibhiḥ kṛtaṃ na tarubhistvadvairivāmabhruvām'
GK16ruyalssu:904: antarnimagracarapuṣpaśaro 'titāpāt kiṃ kiṃ cakāra taruṇo na yadīkṣaṇāgniḥ'
GK16ruyalssu:908: lopaḥ kṛtaḥ kila paratvajuṣo vibhakte- stairlakṣaṇaṃ tava kṛtaṃ dhruvameva
GK16ruyalssu:911: 'sīmānaṃ na jagāma yannayanayornānyena yatsaṃgataṃ na spṛṣṭaṃ vacasā kadācidapi yad dṛṣṭopamānaṃ na yat /
GK16ruyalssu:912: arthādāpatitaṃ na yanna ca na yattatkiñcideṇīdṛśāṃ lāvaṇyaṃ jayati pramāṇarahitaṃ cetaścamatkārakam'
GK16ruyalssu:923: 'gaṇḍānte madadantināṃ prahṛrataḥ kṣmāmaṇḍale vaidhṛte rakṣāmācarataḥ sadā
GK16ruyalssu:925: pūrvāmatyajataḥ sthitiṃ śubhakarīmāsevyamānasya te vardhante vijayaśriyaḥ kimiva na śreyasvināṃ maṅgalam' //
GK16ruyalssu:927: 'prasarpattātparyairapi sadanumānaikarasikai- rapi jñeyo no yaḥ parimitagatitvaṃ parijahṛt
GK16ruyalssu:928: apūrvavyāpāro guruvara! budhairityavasito na vācyo no lakṣyastava sahṛdayasyo guṇagaṇaḥ'
GK16ruyalssu:935: kiṃ tu vigalitavedyānataratvena parihṛtapārimityo vyañjanalakṣaṇāpūrvavyāpāraviṣayīkṛto 'nukāryānukartṛgatatvapari hāreṇa sahṛdayagata iti prasarpattātparyairityādipadai rasa eva pratīyate /
GK16ruyalssu:938: 'paśyantī trapayeva yatra tirayatyātmānamābhyantare yatra truṭyati madhyamāpi madhuradhvanyujjihāsārasāt
GK16ruyalssu:939: cāṭūccāraṇacāpalaṃ vidadhatāṃ vāk tatra bāhyā kathaṃ devyā te parayā prabho saha rahaḥkrīḍādṛḍhāliṅgane'
GK16ruyalssu:942: tatra śuddhakāryasamārope kāryasya viśeṣaṇatvamaupacārikamāśritya viśeṣaṇasāmyāditi lakṣaṇaṃ pūrvaśāstrānusāreṇa vihitaṃ yathākathañcid yojyam /
GK16ruyalssu:948: prasādayantī sakalaṅkamindumiti viśeṣaṇasāmyāccharadonāyikātvapratītau tadunuguṇyāt tayoḥ samāsoktyā nāyakatvapratītiriti cet ārdranakhakṣatābhamaindraṃ dhanurdadhānetyetadviśeṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ sāmyena nirdriṣṭam /
GK16ruyalssu:951: atrocyate-ekadeśavivartinyupamā yadi pratipadaṃ noktā tat sā kena
GK16ruyalssu:954: athātra nopamānatvena nāyakaḥ svasvarūpeṇa pratīyate apitu raviśaśinorevanāyakatvapratītiḥ
GK16ruyalssu:956: tadatrārdranakhakṣatābhamityatra sthitamapi śrutyopamānatvaṃ vastuparyālocanayā aindre dhanuṣi saṃcāraṇīyam, indracāpābhaṃ nakhakṣataṃ dadhāneti pratīteḥ, yathā 'dadhnā juhoti' ityādau dadhni saṃcaryate vidhiḥ
GK16ruyalssu:958: iha punaḥ ityatra saraḥśriyāṃ nāyikātvapratītirna samāsoktyā,
GK16ruyalssu:963: viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ yojayituṃ śakyaṃ tatraupamyagarbhaviśeṣaṇaprabhāvitā samāsoktireveti na virodhaḥ kaścit /
GK16ruyalssu:964: sā ca samāroktirarthāntaranyāse kacitsamarthyagatatvena kacitsamarthakagatatvena ca bhavati
GK16ruyalssu:969: anākramya jagat sarve no saṃdhyāṃ bhajate raviḥ' //
GK16ruyalssu:970: atropagūḍhatvena śāntataḍitkaṭākṣatvena ca śaśāṅkaśaradornāyakavyavahārapratītau samāsoktyāliṅgita evārtho viśeṣarūpaḥ sāmānyāśrayeṇārthāntaranyāsena samarthyate /
GK16ruyalssu:973: asamātpetyādau tu strīśabdasya sāmānyena strītvamātrābhidhānāt sāmānyarūpo
GK16ruyalssu:978: atra nirmokapaṭṭāpahnavena samāropitāyā mandākinyā yadvastuvṛttena pādamūle veṣṭanaṃ taccaraṇamūle veṣṭanatvena śleṣamūlayātiśayoktyādhyavasīyate /
GK16ruyalssu:982: evaṃ 'nakhakṣatānīva vanasthalīnām' ityatrāpi vanasthalīnāṃ nāyikāvyavahāra utprekṣāntarānupraviṣṭasamāsoktimūla eva /
GK16ruyalssu:989: evaṃ ca pratīyamānāṃśasya vācyonmukhatvātparikara iti sārthakaṃ nāma /
GK16ruyalssu:990: 'rājño mānadhanasya kārmukabhṛto duryodhanasyāgrataḥ pratyakṣaṃ kurubāndhavasya miṣataḥ karṇasya śalyasya ca /
GK16ruyalssu:991: pītaṃ tasya mayādya pāṇḍavavadhūkeśāmbarākarṣiṇaḥ koṣṇaṃ jīvata eva
GK16ruyalssu:995: 'aṅgāja senāpate rājavallabha droṇopahāsin karṇaṃ, sāṃprataṃ rakṣainaṃ bhīmād duḥśāsanam' ityādau jñeyam /
GK16ruyalssu:1000: tatra dvayoḥ prākaraṇikayoraprākaraṇikayoḥ prākaraṇikāprakaraṇikayor vā śliṣṭapadopanibandhe śleṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalssu:1001: tatrādyaṃ prakāradvayaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasāmya eva tṛtīyastu prakāro viśeṣaṇasāmya eva bhavati
GK16ruyalssu:1010: yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchirohara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ pāyātsa svayamandhakakṣayakarastvāṃ sarvadomādhavaḥ'
GK16ruyalssu:1013: 'svecchopajātaviṣayo 'pi na yāti vaktuṃ dehīti mārgaṇaśataiśca dadāti
GK16ruyalssu:1027: nirasya puṣpeṣu ruciṃ samagrāṃ padmā virejuḥ śramaṇā yathaiva' //
